de.polygonal.ds.mem.ShortMemory

type
class
extends
MemoryAccess
A chunk of 'alchemy memory' for storing 16-bit signed integers.

Static Methods

ofArray(input : Array<Int>, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : ShortMemory

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (if debug flag is set).
Converts the input data in the range [min,max] to 'alchemy memory'. If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

clear() : Void

inherited from de.polygonal.ds.mem.MemoryAccess
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Memory was already deallocated (if debug flag is set).
Sets all bytes to zero.

free() : Void

inherited from de.polygonal.ds.mem.MemoryAccess
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Memory was already deallocated (if debug flag is set).
Releases allocated memory. Invoke this method before the instance is garbage collected to prevent a memory leak.

get(i : Int) : Int

throws
de.polygonal.ds.mem.error.SegmentationFault Index out of range (if debug flag is set).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Memory deallocated (if debug flag is set).
Returns the value stored at index i.

getAddr(i : Int) : Int

throws
de.polygonal.ds.mem.error.SegmentationFault Index out of range (if debug flag is set).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Memory deallocated (if debug flag is set).
Returns the memory byte offset for the value at index i.

throws

swp(i : Int, j : Int) : Void

throws
de.polygonal.ds.mem.error.SegmentationFault Index out of range (if debug flag is set).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError i == j (if debug flag is set).
Swaps the value at index i with the value at index j.

toString() : String

Returns a string representing the current object. Prints out all elements if compiled with the -debug flag.
